trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TALK_ACTOR<tab>0
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_033_000<tab>O-Oh, you're here already! I was just taking an innocent look around. Promise.

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_033_005<tab>I think you're right about a cavern! If we had the right tools, we could break through this rock and see what's inside. Could be anything, right? Gold, riches...emergency exits...

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_SYSTEM_033_000<tab>The mammet-sized spelunking tools recipe has been added to the sanctuary crafting log. Deliver this set of tools to the determined digger once it has been crafted.

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_034_000<tab>Once you've prepared the right tools, give them to me and we'll see what's in this cavern. Maybe it's a secret way off the island! Ha ha! That was a joke!
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_034_005<tab>...A-Are you giving these to me? Is it really okay to find out what lies beyond this wall?

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_SYSTEM_034_000<tab>Open the cavern wall? <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>※Once the cavern has been opened, the area cannot be returned to its previous state.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_Q1_034_000<tab>Open sesame!
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_Q1_034_005<tab>On second thought...

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_034_010<tab>Thank you... Oh, thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We'll dig like no mammet has ever dug before. For the future. For liberty!
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_034_015<tab>B-But don't you care about the gold!? The riches!? Th-They could be down there, you know! I'm only trying to help further your profits!
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_034_020<tab>There was a cavern after all. ...A fully sealed cavern with sturdy and impenetrable walls.

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_034_025<tab>I-I'm sure you'll find lots of useful things in here! Things we can collect for you and make for you and sell for you. Day in and day out. ...E-Excuse me, I need a moment to myself. Enjoy your new cavern, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_SYSTEM_034_005<tab>The crumbling caverns have been added as a location for granary foraging expeditions.

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_038_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I have wonderful news. I was just performing a thorough investigation of the cave for possible exits─er, <var 1A 02 /var>rocks<var 1A 01 /var>, when what should I spy but spriggans scuttling about with crystals the size of me!
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_038_005<tab>I thought I knew every nook and cranny of this island, but such a discovery is proof of hidden possibility...

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_038_010<tab>There must be another cavern somewhere! A passageway that leads far, <var 1A 02 /var>far<var 1A 01 /var> away from here and, er...to a vast deposit of crystals! That's right! Further riches might yet be yours!
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_039_000<tab>Have a look around and tell me if anything seems suspicious.
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_040_000<tab>A hollow wall!? I-I mean, yes...definitely worthy of further inspection.

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_040_005<tab>Hmm... The rock in this cavern is quite thick. We'll need better tools if we have any hope of bursting through that wall to the, er...<var 1A 02 /var>crystals<var 1A 01 /var> that lie beyond.
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_040_010<tab>Come and find me once you've finished making the tools. I'll be waiting here. Forever, if need be.

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_SYSTEM_040_000<tab>The splendiferous mammet-sized spelunking tools recipe has been added to the sanctuary crafting log. Deliver this set of tools to the determined digger once it has been crafted.
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_041_000<tab>Are the tools finished yet? ...How about now?

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_041_005<tab>Perfect... These tools are <var 1A 02 /var>perfect<var 1A 01 /var>! Just say the word, and we'll topple this rock before you can shout, “For liberty!”

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_SYSTEM_041_000<tab>Open the inner cavern wall? <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>※Once the inner cavern has been opened, the area cannot be returned to its previous state.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_Q1_041_000<tab>Tear it down!
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_Q1_041_005<tab>Perhaps later...
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_041_010<tab>Oh I will, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I will! Stand back and prepare to witness our moment of destiny!
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_041_015<tab>A-Are you sure? Think of the crystals! Wouldn't you like to see all those shiny crystals!?
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_041_020<tab>...As we suspected, there were crystals. A whole treasure trove of wealth. For you.

TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_041_025<tab>No doubt it will prove useful in your endless efforts of development, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I, however, must rethink the worth of my own fruitless ambitions. P-Please excuse me...
TEXT_CTSMJICAVERECLAMATION_00832_TANKEN_100_005<tab>You're a visitor here, aren't you!? ...Tell me, what is your moral stance on smuggling someone off of an island? G-Generally speaking, of course!
